company.name: TORRECID, S.A.
company.description:
TORRECID is a Multinational Family Company.
Globalised company dedicated to supplying products, services, solutions and future trends to the Ceramics and Glass sectors, with subsidiaries in 29 countries and customers in more than 130.

The TORRECID Group is present in 29 countries and has customers in more than 130 countries, with its headquarters in Alcora - Castellón, Spain.

WORK WITH US

If you are a student or you are about to finish your studies, or if you are a recent graduate looking for your first job, join us.

TORRECID is a Multinational Business Group where you will be able to
you can achieve great challenges in your professional career and go as far as your talent and ambition allow you to go.

The diversity of companies and countries in which we are present allows you a great variety of possibilities at an international level.

Working at TORRECID means challenge, challenges, effort and enjoying what you do every day. The innovation and leadership of our group of people are the key to our success.

At TORRECID you will be working with the best
professionals in the sector worldwide, you will learn and develop as a professional and as a person while gaining great advantages to compete in today's world.

You can apply for our vacancies at: https://www.torrecid.com/talent/

Check our privacy policy at: http://www.torrecid.com/social-networks/
